body: Alireza Pahalvi's death shocked many people. Neo-Resistance writes about Alireza's life and death. Some called him "little prince" of Pahlavi's dynasty.
original_body: Alireza Pahalvi's death shocked many people. Neo-Resistance writes about Alireza's life and death. Some called him "little prince" of Pahlavi's dynasty.
title: Iran: Remember "the little prince"
